properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
ANGUILLA.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
S/V BLUE SPIRIT, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN 18-05.1N 063-41.4W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RSC
SAN JUAN, PHONE: 787 289 2041, E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL.
